sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of JPMorgan Chase ( JPM ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.2%.
Year to date, JPMorgan Chaseregisters a 1.4% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.6%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 8.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Coca-Cola ( KO ), trading down 0.6%, and Chevron Corporation ( CVX ), trading up 1.4% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
